summary: Restores removed by default magical flow animation during corpse reanimation and glowing effect on corpses after it in Requiem.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=6]DESCRIPTION
[/size][/font][/center][font=Arial][size=2]This mod just restores removed by default magical flow animation during corpse reanimation and glowing effect on corpses after it in [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]. It's removed because of many bugs, e.g. loss of the effect of glow from the corpses after changing location. But who cares?[/size][/font]

﻿[center]
﻿[/center][center][font=Times New Roman][size=6]COMPATIBILITY[/size][/font][/center]This patch is created for Requiem 1.9.4.1. I don't tested it on 2.0.x, it may rewrite some 2.0 changes on reanimate spells, if there are any.



[center][font=Times New Roman][size=6]CREDITS[/size][/font][/center][center]﻿Bethesda Softworks for Skyrim[/center][center]The Requiem Dungeon Masters for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19281]Requiem[/url]﻿[/center][center]xEdit Team for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/]TES5Edit﻿[/url]﻿[/center]
author: FadrenIndoril
